skillTree.name: Elven Steed
skillTree.description: The best of all horse breeds found anywhere in the world, Elven steeds are noble, intelligent, graceful, and swift.

skillTree.name: Barded Ithilmar Steed
skillTree.description: An extremely light yet resilient material, Ithilmar gives the same protection as heavy steel, but without slowing down its wearer.

skillTree.name: Great Eagle
skillTree.description: Ulthuan's Great Eagles are the firm allies of the Elves, fighting their causes since the coming of Chaos.

skillTree.name: Ward of Isha
skillTree.description: Isha's protection can protect the faithful Asur through the darkest of days.

skillTree.name: Isha's Blessing
skillTree.description: Isha's blessing is only granted to the worthy - those who seek to protect life rather than take it.

skillTree.name: Touch of the Everqueen
skillTree.description: Those of a fell heart will be destroyed if they receive the Everqueen's touch.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +4 when fighting against Vampire Counts, Vampire Coast and Tomb Kings
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Chaos Bane
skillTree.description: The Everqueen can banish the taint of Chaos with a single touch.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +4 when fighting against Warriors of Chaos, Norsca and Beastmen
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Tradition Dictates
skillTree.description: While Alarielle herself is seen as a radical force, she is bound to certain ceremonial duties, which is reassuring for many Asur.

skillTree.name: Leader of the Court
skillTree.description: Elves are political creatures, but the Everqueen exists above such debased notions; when she speaks all listen and put aside petty machinations.

effects.description:
Construction cost: -10% for all buildings
	(local province)

skillTree.name: Servant of Isha
skillTree.description: As a paragon of the Earth Mother and queen of Avelorn, growth and fortitude for the land itself is promoted.

effects.description:
Hero recruit rank: +1 for Handmaidens
	(all provinces)

Hero recruit rank: +2 for Handmaidens
	(all provinces)

skillTree.name: Spiritual Defender
skillTree.description: The spiritual defence and well-being of the Elves is the traditional duty of the Everqueen.

effects.description:
Melee defence: +10 for Sisters of Avelorn units
	(local armies)

Recruitment duration: -1 turn for Sisters of Avelorn units (minimum 1)
	(all provinces)

skillTree.name: Blood & Fire
skillTree.description: The Everqueen does not traditionally go to war, but Alarielle is different - she will punish the invaders of Avelorn!

skillTree.name: Beacon of Hope
skillTree.description: Representing the Isha and all the Gods of the Cadai, the Everqueen is a beacon of hope in these turbulent times.

skillTree.name: Gifts of Isha
skillTree.description: A gift from Isha; no wounds are beyond Alarielle's skills and her wards of protection know no equal.

effects.description:
Armour: +10 for Dryads, Tree Kin and Treeman units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +20 for Dryads, Tree Kin and Treeman units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Guardian of the Land
skillTree.description: As guardian of the lands, the Everqueen can manipulate the Lores of Life and Light with unrivalled skill.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +9 for Forest Spirit units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Earth Blood
skillTree.description: The Wizard draws wholesome energies from the soil, imbuing companions with the natural resilience of the earth.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Earth Blood"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Earth Blood Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Earth Blood Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Pha's Protection"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Pha's Protection Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Pha's Protection Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Life Bloom
skillTree.description: Even the simplest of spells can bring forth the full bloom of renewal, reinvigorating and healing the broken and bleeding.

skillTree.name: Shield of Thorns
skillTree.description: Prickly gorse bursts from the ground around the caster's allies, protecting them from attack like a spiky, living shield.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Shield of Thorns"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Shield of Thorns Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Shield of Thorns Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Tempest Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Arcane Unforging"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Arcane Unforging Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Arcane Unforging Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Banishment Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Inspiring Presence
skillTree.description: There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

skillTree.name: Militia Master
skillTree.description: Turning an untrained bunch of regular citizens into effective fighting units requires a special kind of talent, and oodles of patience.

effects.description:
Melee defence: +4 for Spearmen, Silverin Guard, Rangers, Archers and Lothern Sea Guard units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Spearmen, Silverin Guard, Rangers, Archers and Lothern Sea Guard units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +6 for Spearmen, Silverin Guard, Rangers, Archers and Lothern Sea Guard units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +8 for Spearmen, Silverin Guard, Rangers, Archers and Lothern Sea Guard units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +8 for Spearmen, Silverin Guard, Rangers, Archers and Lothern Sea Guard units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Bow Master
skillTree.description: Missile combat isn't always about attacking; knowing how to defend also pays dividends.

effects.description:
Ammunition: +8% for Archers, Lothern Sea Guard, Shadow Warriors, Shadow-walkers, Sisters of Avelorn and Bolt Thrower units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +12% for Archers, Lothern Sea Guard, Shadow Warriors, Shadow-walkers, Sisters of Avelorn and Bolt Thrower units
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +7% for Archers, Lothern Sea Guard, Shadow Warriors, Shadow-walkers, Sisters of Avelorn and Bolt Thrower units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +20% for Archers, Lothern Sea Guard, Shadow Warriors, Shadow-walkers, Sisters of Avelorn and Bolt Thrower units
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +10% for Archers, Lothern Sea Guard, Shadow Warriors, Shadow-walkers, Sisters of Avelorn and Bolt Thrower units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Cavalry Master
skillTree.description: Years of experience in mounted combat has started to pay off; this one is always in command of both their force and its steeds.

effects.description:
Speed: +5% for Ellyrian Reavers and Silver Helms units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +9% for Ellyrian Reavers units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +7% for Ellyrian Reavers and Silver Helms units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +9 for Ellyrian Reavers and Silver Helms units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +12% for Ellyrian Reavers units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +10% for Ellyrian Reavers and Silver Helms units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +12 for Ellyrian Reavers and Silver Helms units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Vanguard Master
skillTree.description: Being present at the very forefront of the assault, on many occasions, prepares one for future engagements of a similar nature.

effects.description:
Charge bonus: +6 for Chariot, War Lion and Dragon Princes units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Chariot, War Lion and Dragon Princes units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +9% for Tiranoc Chariot units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +9 for Chariot, War Lion and Dragon Princes units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +8 for Chariot, War Lion and Dragon Princes units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +12% for Tiranoc Chariot units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +12 for Chariot, War Lion and Dragon Princes units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Sky Master
skillTree.description: The firmament holds no fear for this one, such is their command of the many airborne beasts of battle.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +6% for Great Eagle, Phoenix and Dragon units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +9% for Great Eagle, Phoenix and Dragon units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +9 for Great Eagle, Phoenix and Dragon units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +12% for Great Eagle, Phoenix and Dragon units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +12 for Great Eagle, Phoenix and Dragon units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Master Strategist
skillTree.description: Knowing that it is the rare plan that survives contact with the enemy, yet being prepared for all eventualities, raises this one above mere planners.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +4 for Swordmasters of Hoeth, White Lions of Chrace and Phoenix Guard units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Swordmasters of Hoeth, White Lions of Chrace and Phoenix Guard units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +6 for Swordmasters of Hoeth, White Lions of Chrace and Phoenix Guard units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +8 for Swordmasters of Hoeth, White Lions of Chrace and Phoenix Guard units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +8 for Swordmasters of Hoeth, White Lions of Chrace and Phoenix Guard units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Immovable Force
skillTree.description: Like a wall of the hardest stone imaginable - such is their ability to withstand attack.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +10% for Spearmen, Silverin Guard, Silver Helms, Swordmasters of Hoeth and White Lions of Chrace units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +5 for Spearmen, Silverin Guard, Silver Helms, Swordmasters of Hoeth and White Lions of Chrace units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Magic resistance: 15% for Spearmen, Silverin Guard, Silver Helms, Swordmasters of Hoeth and White Lions of Chrace units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Favourable Winds
skillTree.description: When the gale always blows in the direction of your choosing, failure becomes a rare event indeed.

effects.description:
Missile strength: +12% for Archers and Lothern Sea Guard, Shadow Warriors, Shadow-walkers, Sisters of Avelorn and Bolt Thrower units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +10 for Archers, Lothern Sea Guard, Shadow Warriors, Shadow-walkers, Sisters of Avelorn and Bolt Thrower units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: 10% for Archers, Lothern Sea Guard, Shadow Warriors, Shadow-walkers, Sisters of Avelorn and Bolt Thrower units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Silver Torrent
skillTree.description: Speed, agility and control - all must be mastered if your crushing tide is to break perfectly upon enemy shores.

effects.description:
Speed: +10% for Rangers, Great Eagle, War Lion, Chariot and Ellyrian Reavers units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +12% for Rangers, Great Eagle, War Lion, Chariot and Ellyrian Reavers units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: 15% for Rangers, Great Eagle, War Lion, Chariot and Ellyrian Reavers units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Heart of the Flame
skillTree.description: The very centre of the fire always burns the hottest.

effects.description:
Armour: +10 for Dragon, Phoenixes, Dragon Princes and Phoenix Guard units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +5 for Dragon, Phoenixes, Dragon Princes and Phoenix Guard units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Physical resistance: 5% for Dragon, Phoenixes, Dragon Princes and Phoenix Guard units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Route Marcher
skillTree.description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.

skillTree.name: Radiant
skillTree.description: She is the Radiant – Isha's chosen – her beauty radiating not merely from without but from within.

skillTree.name: Merchant Lord
skillTree.description: “Underlying most arguments against the free market is a lack of belief in freedom itself.”

skillTree.name: Bonded Service
skillTree.description: The Lords rule, the peasants toil. Nothing has changed in over a thousand years.

skillTree.name: Elven Healing
skillTree.description: The ancient Asur arts teach one how to heal as well as how to harm.

effects.description:
Attrition: -3% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -8% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -15% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Draftmaster
skillTree.description: Someone has to ensure the numbers and quality of recruits remain high.

skillTree.name: Lightning Strike
skillTree.description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.name: Quartermaster
skillTree.description: A good quartermaster can ration equipment and foodstuffs efficiently, making supplies last longer.

skillTree.name: Wary
skillTree.description: This warrior has been ambushed previously and got themselves and many of their compatriots away safely. Such things make one naturally suspicious.

skillTree.name: Elven Scholar
skillTree.description: Far removed from the petty squabbles of other races, many High Elves are able to devote themselves to learning, magic and the arts.

skillTree.name: Renowned & Loved
skillTree.description: All Asur adore the Everqueen, but Alarielle is especially beloved for her willingness to join warriors in battle.

items.name: Star of Avelorn
items.description: The Star of Avelorn was taken from the heavens by Isha and bound to a crystal. It holds the power to heal mortal wounds.

backgroundSkills.name: The Radiant
backgroundSkills.description: As Everqueen of all Asur, Alarielle is leader of Avelorn and Ulthuan’s spiritual head.

effects.description:
Missile strength: +15% for Sisters of Avelorn and Handmaiden units
	(Lord's army)
